text: Mixing the Flavors Baste the chopped onions and tomatoes in a pressure cooker. The "basting" method is explained here. Add turmeric powder.  Add garam masala powder.  Add coriander powder.  Mix well.  Add Kashmiri veri masala.  Mix well. The Kashmiri veri masala is a solid piece and takes time to blend with the rest of the ingredients and for its authentic flavor to be fully infused. As it breaks down, you'll really be able to smell the spices present in it, which is awesome. Adding Potatoes Add the chopped potatoes.  Add water.  Mix well.  Cook under pressure. Cook until there are two to three whistles (about 6-9 minutes; see Tips below). Allow it to cool down, then remove the lid. Add the chopped coriander leaves.  Mix well.  Serve with rice or rotis.
